trans-unit.source: Represents the Subject element specified in [Saml2Core, 2.4.1].
trans-unit.target: 表示在 [Saml2Core，2.4.1] 中指定的使用者元素。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.NameId%2A> property is `null` and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.SubjectConfirmations%2A> collection is empty, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.NameId%2A>属性是`null`和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.SubjectConfirmations%2A>集合为空，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>将在序列化过程中引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.SubjectConfirmations%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.NameId%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the element that this class represents, see the SAML V2.0 Core specification.
trans-unit.target: 有关此类表示的元素的详细信息，请参阅 SAML&2;.0 版核心规范。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2NameIdentifier"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject"></xref>使用指定的类<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2NameIdentifier"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.NameId%2A> property is set to the value specified by the `nameId` parameter.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2NameIdentifier"></xref> that represents the name identifier.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SubjectConfirmation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject"></xref>使用指定的类<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SubjectConfirmation"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.SubjectConfirmations%2A> collection is initialized with the value specified by the `subjectConfirmation` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.SubjectConfirmations%2A>使用指定的值初始化集合`subjectConfirmation`参数。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.SubjectConfirmations%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identifier for the subject.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置主题的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains information that allows the subject to be confirmed.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含允许使用者，以确认信息的集合。

trans-unit.source: If more than one subject confirmation is provied, then satisfying any one of them is sufficient to confirm the subject for the purpose of applying the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 多个使用者确认是否提供，则可以满足其中任何一个足以确认为应用断言使用者。
